rows.label: tlk70000048_05_msg0001
rows.name:
To think that there would have
been a monster attack! Thank you
all for lending us your strength.

rows.label: tlk70000048_05_msg0002
rows.name:
Noel and the kids let me
in on all the details.

rows.label: tlk70000048_05_msg0003
rows.name:
I had duties elsewhere and wasn't here
at the time. At least it seems like the
enemy didn't have it together...

rows.label: tlk70000048_05_msg0004
rows.name:
After the attack, the other
leaders and I met to come up
with a plan from here on out.

rows.label: tlk70000048_05_msg0005
rows.name:
Even Augusto seemed riled up and
eager to iron out a plan. Not sure
I've ever seen him so worked up.
